TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Defines the attribute that controls use to identify string properties containing URL values. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The UrlPropertyAttribute attribute is an attribute applied to a control property that represents a URL. In addition to marking a string property as representing a URL, the UrlPropertyAttribute attribute defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property that identifies specific file types that can be used to filter against the property.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. In this code example, a UrlPropertyAttribute attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.urlprope_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.urlprope_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> class is initialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property set to the value "*.\*".
## Examples The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. In this code example, a default <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. The attribute indicates support for all URL types and specifies a default file filter set to "*.\*".
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.web.ui.urlprope_0_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.web.ui.urlprope_0_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filter) cil managed

Docs.param: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property to the specified string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> class created with this constructor is initialized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute.Filter%2A> property set to `filter`.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. In this code example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.web.ui.urlprope_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.web.ui.urlprope_1_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.Object> to compare with this instance or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
Docs.returns: if equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets a file filter associated with the URL-specific property.
Docs.value: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property. The default is "*.\*".

remarks.format: ## Remarks A designer provides a filter in file selectors based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute> attribute. By default, it is initialized to "*.\*", which specifies all files with a file extension. You can set the filter for more specific file types; for example, the filter "\*.aspx" indicates that only ASP.NET files are represented by the URL-specific property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
